text: sillo ‘ssapa’ eondeoggwa ‘maleuwa’ eondeog-eun hananim-ui pyosig jung-ui hanala. geuleoni geu jib(ka-euba)eulo seongjisunlye(hasjeu)leul hageona sosunlye(umeula)leul haneun jaga geu dul saileul doneun geos-eun geuege joega doeji anhnola. jabaljeog-eulo seonhaeng-eul silcheonhaneun jaga issdamyeon sillo hananimkkeseoneun gajang pungseonghi bodabhasigo modeun geos-eul algo gyesineun bun-ila
